website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a deal on dental guards and good customer service, this 3-pack has the competitors beat.
pros: Helpful customer support is readily available
cons: Runs on the large side, which may require extra trimming/shaping

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and company.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product and the companies customer service. After following the instructions to create my mouth guard, I got a pretty nice fit compared to other guards I've used, but it still had that annoying "bulk" to it. Luckily I read through the instructions completely and saw that ProDental will offer to shave the mouth guard down to about 1mm thickness all around for free if you mail it in to them. They even pay to ship it back to you! I just got mine back in the mail today, and now its PERFECT! Thank you ProDental. I will be recommending your product to anyone that needs a mouth guard in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: No more Grinding - no more destroying my dental work!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and easy to mold. It took very little time custom moulding the tray to my upper teeth. It easily was reheatable to continue to get the right fit for my mouth. It's comfortable and I was worried about drooling but I don't! I'm looking forward to no longer destroying my previous dental work from grinding my teeth whilst I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Anoni

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use alternative to higher-cost customized dental guard devices
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use alternative to higher-cost customized dental guard devices. The key to a good fit is following the directions they provide. It may take one or two tries but then its fairly straightforward. Unless you have the world's toughest bite, the thinner version they offer may be more comfortable for most "grinders".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommended that I get a mouth guard to prevent teeth ...
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended that I get a mouth guard to prevent teeth grinding at night. Sounded simple enough, until they she quoted me $350 to get one custom made. Hmm, time to find an alternative. This is it. I have been using these mouth guards for about 8 months now. Each one lasts me about 4 or 5 months. They are a great deal! Easy to form fit following the youtube instructions. As far as comfort, I have not tried any others so I can't compare, but with enough care with the fitting and then adjustments with scissors, I am able to get these pretty comfortable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: When I ground through my dentist-made bite splint and insurance wouldn’t pay for another, I had to look for alternatives. The first 3-in-1 guards I ordered from this company were too bulky for me. When I contacted them, they sent me this slimmer version, free of charge. They are a little tricky to form, but if you follow the instructions carefully you should be ok. And all it takes is a nail file to make adjustments. These are a great alternative to the expensive ones from the dentist. And this company has excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: They're simple to use, and they work.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a variety of brands and types of night guards, ranging from ridiculously expensive to ... well, to these. And these are by far the best choice for me. They realize that often people will fail to follow the instructions correctly, or will bobble something the first time, so they send you extras. Actually, I've used one of my "mistakes" as a travel back-up when I failed to pack my "regular" guard, and the "failed" guard worked fine, too. This is, by far, the best option I've found. And as my dentist wistfully admitted, "there's no reason that won't work just as well as one I can sell you for $200." Follow the directions, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Best money saving purchase I've made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am so so so happy I didn't spend $400 at the dentist and tried this first. I am a college student and this literally saved my teeth and looks the same. Super happy with it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Katie  Groover

customer_reviews.title: Better than my professional mouth guard and has saved me thousands!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for three years now, and I have no doubt they have saved me thousands for root canals and cracked teeth due to my severe bruxism. With my mouth guard from my dentist, I chewed through it, and it was so uncomfortable and bulky that I would often take it out of my mouth in the middle of the night and wake up holding it! Not. Cute. I have never chewed through one of these. They fit well, are durable, and the instructions are clear and precise. Also, the customer service rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Miamendo

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my hubs expensive dentist made guard. A+
customer_reviews.text: My husband for years wore one of those very expensive mouth guards from the dentist. Over time is was slowly breaking and wore thin on one side causing my husband to have major tooth pain. His new dentist offered to make him a new guard, ugh. I found these and I'm glad I did. We got a set that was a bonus set. It came with 6 guards. 3 were the thicker type I thought we'd receive, the other 3 were much thinner. My husband molded the thinner guards. 1 for sleeping, 1 for the gym. His tooth pain went away in a day or so, no problems since the 3-4 weeks we received them.
customer_reviews.author: glisteningcakes

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PRODUCT AND SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and excellent product. It is a good thing the company includes a smaller mouth guard with the regular. The regular one is huge! The smaller one works perfectly. The company provided thorough and clearly stated directions to prepare the guard for use. I am wearing my guard every night to protect from grinding my teeth and causing cracks!!!!! I wish I had purchased a guard a long time ago; I think it would have saved me two cracked teeth!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GAA

customer_reviews.title: Best mouth guard I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this mouth guard. The first lasted a long time. I have a smaller mouth and like that I can trim it down to fit perfectly. It may take two tries to get the impression and smoothness perfect, but once it is done, it doesn't fall out at night, and fits snugly without rough edges on my tongue. I have cracked two molars due to grinding and so far have not had any more broken teeth since using this mouth guard. The way it is made keeps the molars from getting constant pressure during the night so I don't wake up with a sore jaw either. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, Great Documentation
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like the quality of the material used in this mouth guards. It's good they include three guards in the package, because it can be a challenge to get the guard shaped and molded to your satisfaction with your first effort. It's just the nature of heating the plastic to the right degree of flex and positioning it correctly in your mouth before it sets. I've used similar guards over the years for karate and even with that experience, my first attempt was a flop. I love the fact that the ProDental comes with so much supporting documentation to make the process as helpful as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Baker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Had the hard dentist version for over 5 years before I cracked it. Yeah, I really grind my teeth. You do need to make sure the water is boiling for the mold to work. I like the fit better than the dentist version. This one fits more like a retainer than just the teeth cover from the dentist. There is no bad smell or taste, which is a MAJOR plus for me, as I pretty sensitive to those. Will need to see how long one will last, but since multiples arrived, as long as one can last at least 2 years, all will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this two years ago for suspect night time clenching. After molding & fitting it, I showed it to my dentist who approved it. Turns out my tmj might be involved as well as nerve pressure from my cpap mask. This only happens rarely, but when it does, I wake w/ excruciating teeth/nerve pain which dramatically subsides when cold is applied. I decided using this mouth guard after placing it in the freezer would be a good idea. This doesn't happen regularly, I don't use the guard often & it's stored away. Now I can't find it, so I will be ordering a new one. Stress is definitely a trigger for these episodes.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Five star company and product
customer_reviews.text: This PRODUCT AND COMPANY are truly amazing!! I cannot recommend them highly enough. The product is easy to manage and work with. The results are exactly what you would hope for and the great news is that it comes with three guard molds to make sure you attain exactly the results you desire. The Dentist who markets this product is truly concerned about his "on-line" patients. He answered my e-mail on the day I sent it. I can't even get my hometown dentist to do this! Thank you, my dentist friend. Your product has made my nighttime grinding a thing of the past. Thanks for making my life better!
customer_reviews.author: rflorez

customer_reviews.title: I was able to get the product pretty thin. I'd say the product is definitely worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to form my own custom night guard for clenching/grinding. The molds are thicker than the kind you get from the dentist but with perseverance, I was able to get the product pretty thin. I'd say the product is definitely worth the time, effort, and money. I will be saving hundreds of dollars using this guard instead of the one made by my dentist. Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: J. Han

customer_reviews.title: Clear instructions, comfort and cost saving
customer_reviews.text: I use my mouth guard for sleeping. The gel like material is very comfortable, and I made the first impression without any glitches , but did review the vidoe instruction sheets several times. They were extremely helpful. I like that the guard should last about a year. That means I have three years with the other two mouth pieces. I'll write back if they don't make it through the year, but I am not a jaw locking chomper at night.
customer_reviews.author: Linda's 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping, a great product, and an outstanding seller!
customer_reviews.text: These guards are really easy to mold, they fit perfectly once molded, and I was surprised that it stays in place all night. It has helped me with pain from nighttime grinding so I am very pleased with this product. The seller offers outstanding customer service and had reached out to me to ensure my total satisfaction with molding the product, the product itself, and to make sure that I had any help I needed with these guards. Super fast shipping, a great product, and an outstanding seller!
customer_reviews.author: Bittrswe3t

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest night guard I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are way better quality than you would imagine for the price. The only thing I didn't love about these was the set of ludicrously over-specific instructions. I had to write a condensed version myself. Once you break the instructions down they're quite easy to use. I got sent a number of additional guards, but nearly a year later I'm still using the first one I fitted. Most of the night guards I got from drug stores didn't last 3 months, and they cost three times this much for just a single unit. This is a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: mo_is_me

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 5 stars to this purchase for the excellent customer service and post-purchase care, even though these mouth guards did not fit my smaller mouth well. The kit that I purchased came with detailed instructions on how to mold and form the guards, and what to do if the guards did not fit my mouth. These were a bit too thick for me, but by following the instructions, the company sent me two thinner ProDental Ultra ComfortTM Dental Guards free of charge as replacements, and the new thinner ones fit very well. I am very pleased that I have found a brand of affordable mouth guards that are comfortable and relatively easy to mold.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: ProDental is a fabulous company to work with & great quality mouth guards!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mouth guards. I found the fitting video and the written instructions of GREAT help....the video especially! I was bothered by the thickness of the guards....they worked...but I felt I would appreciate a thinner mouth guard. ProDental had sent me emails checking in on me and offered to send me 3 thinner guards. WOW! What a difference! I really like these! ProDental is right there for you! Customer service second to none. They are easily contacted via email or phone. I'd recommend the thinner ProDental mouth guards to everyone! This company wants you to be satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Keep your chompers chip-free
customer_reviews.text: I grind my teeth when I sleep. My dentist has been telling me for YEARS that I needed one. I didn't want to spend the money on one from the dentist, so I decided to just forget about it. Two months ago, during a period of high stress, I was grinding my teeth so badly that I chipped two. Three-hundred and sixty dollars later, my teeth look as good as new. And I'm protecting the investment by wearing a ProDental mouth guard now when I sleep. The custom fit was a snap or a bite. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold after watching the video (I was sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mold after watching the video (I was sent an email link directly from the seller after my purchase). I grind my teeth horribly at night and haven't had any tooth pain, jaw ache, or middle of the night wakeups associated with tooth grinding since I started wearing this guard. Update: 18 months later, I am still loving these night guards. I have noticed such a difference in my quality of sleep since using these guards specifically (I'd tried other types on the past)--no more early morning tooth pain, no more waking up to the shooting pain sensation and feeling of grinding. My dentist has even commented on how much better my grinding (or lack thereof) has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Unusal circumstances, but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had an infection and had 20 teeth pulled, my dentist recommended a mouth guard until I get my new teeth because I'm a grinder and I had all my top teeth pulled. The first night I grinded my gums and got these asap. I cut them since I don't have all my bottom teeth after it being incredibly uncomfortable. It may just be for my circumstances, but I wouldn't recommend them for anyone in the same/similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable as a night guard
customer_reviews.text: I had a dentist-made night guard that was horribly uncomfortable (and expensive) so I stopped using it. My new dentist recommended just getting this and it's great. A bit more expensive than the cheapest ones available, but this is sturdy enough that I cannot imagine what I'm going to do with the other two in the pack. And it's very comfortable to wear at night. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best cheap mouth guard I've used. I had expensive one made by the dentist and it worn out within a couple years because they made it too thin at certain points, which is totally unnecessary. Other brands of mouth guard I used tend to either not fitting well or too thin somewhere as well. This one actually is easy to make, fits quite nicely without me biting hard on it.
customer_reviews.author: yingzi

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as others
customer_reviews.text: There was another one I was using, but I thought I'd try this since it is cheaper and has great reviews. I actually don't like it as much because it didn't mold as well. I feel like it was also shifting my teeth because the plastic where you bite is so soft, whereas the other one stayed put after you molded it. The molding process also wasn't as easy. I mean, it was the same process, but I had to do it a few times vs one and done with the other. I will be going back to the mouth guard I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: lilillaura

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for night teeth clenching!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The original guards that were shipped were too large for my mouth. I contacted the seller and they promptly sent me replacements. The replacements have worked out very well to protect my teeth and jaws from nighttime teeth clenching. Although not as thin as my previous guard made by my dentist, these are very workable and well worth the price. I would recommend that you watch the video for additional tips on fitting the guards. It is very helpful. The seller provides excellent customer service and is very proactive in making sure you are satisfied with their product. I would definitely recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to get fitted to the mouth and uncomfortable. The video that describes how to fit it to your teeth suggests possibly heating it twice but I ended up doing so six times and still not getting a tight fit that stayed in my mouth. It is also extremely thick at the bottom of the teeth, which is extremely uncomfortable and kept me up all night each time I tried to use it. I don’t recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good for helping night time grinding and clenching teeth.
customer_reviews.text: Best fit of any guard I've ever tried. All others have fallen out while I sleep, and haven't fit in my mouth well. This fits firmly yet comfortably, and doesn't move. I clench and grind my teeth, so have gone through a lot of guards very quickly. This one hold up longer. It is plastic, so will eventually wear down. After a month I can tell it is starting to wear. Other guards have had to be replaced within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a small mouth
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to provide me with immediate relief from my teeth grinding, unfortunately this product was not able to do that. I have a small mouth and the guard was way too big despite trimming both the back and sides. I understand the seller was willing to have me send the product in to have it trimmed but I was not interested in sending a product in over and over again to have it adjusted until it properly fit. I needed something for immediate relieve and this did not do it. I ended up going to Walgreens to buy a smaller guard which worked until I could get a professional dentist guard made.
customer_reviews.author: kelbel

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING. I've been buying the $20 guards from Target ...
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. I've been buying the $20 guards from Target for over a year before landing on these. I always used to chew through them during the night and would need to buy a new pair 2-3 months in. Not with this ProDental guard though! I've had it for 7 months and there is no wear visible. I will never go back to using another brand. I have a guard at home and one in my car for traveling (I travel in-state for work often). The only note I have is to watch the guard in the boiling water. I think the directions say 10-15 seconds or something and mine was pliable within just a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Best Mouth Guard I have Ever used
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Just as expected and easy to mold to your bite. These mouth guards last a long long time and are comfortable. I have used several others in the past and would grind through them in 6 months or less. Not these. Been using the same one for 18 months now and it is still as good as when I first stated using it. Hard to believe. It still fits and works just like it should. I got five of these suckers and may last me 10 years or more at this rate. Very pleased with these. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: TRULY THE BEST GUARD EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Even the guards I had ordered years ago through my Dentist are not as good as this Tooth Guard! I will never pay hundreds of dollars to buy a tooth guard from my dentist when I can order them here! I am extremely pleased and will recommend to family and friends... Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: The best experience ever
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent a detailed email prior to receipt of the mouth guard. The email contained excellent information, complete with a video, which helped tremendously as it's one thing to read directions and yet another to actually see them put into place. Because of this communication, the mouth guard was easily moulded to fit. This was a great experience and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley's Folks

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: They added a set of the ultra thin guards as well! Superior customer service. Now I can try both and see which works better for me. Will definitely stick with this brand for a long time. The 3 in 1 was a little thick, but I didn’t wake up with any jaw pain. Tried the ultra thin last night. A little less protection on the sides of my mouth but overall, significantly less pain than with other guards. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I had tried and been disappointed with several different mouth guards (for teeth grinding) -different brands and different price ranges - before finding the ProDental. When I first ordered them they were too thick, hurting my teeth, and too uncomfortable to keep on through the night. I emailed them and they immediately responded and sent out two thinner ones for me to try. The ease and timeliness of this process was beyond expectations. I tried the thinner ones and loved them. They fit better than any others I have tried, come with easy and thorough instructions, and thankfully are providing a good, comfortable and affordable option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tooth guard!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to fit. I tried several times with the same guard before I was satisfied with the fit. No reason to get discouraged; just patiently try again until you find the precise technique that works for you. Once fitted the guard works perfectly for my application; far better than other "inexpensive" dental guards that I have used. I won't strength train without it.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Durable? Yes.
customer_reviews.text: These night guards have been the most durable that I have used to date. I have yet to eat one or chew through one completely. This is a monumental task and testament to the material that these mouthguards are made from. I would absolutely buy them again and refer them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andreae

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These guards have been a good replacement to a dentist-made mouth guard that I had lost. After trying the thicker variety of Prodental guards, I reached out to customer service to try the thinner version. These are comfortable in the mouth and not too hard to mold. They are less sturdy than the kind from the dentist, but for the price it's a great deal. And the customer service I received for these guards exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Shapes easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like this guard. I use it for sleeping as I grind my teeth and my dentist recommended having to use one to save my teeth. The material and thickness are very good. I had others that were just too thick and were hard to conform to my teeth and would not stay in place. Other guards over time would be just like hard plastic and you could not reshape them if you tried. This one stays much more flexible; yet stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and company to do business with!
customer_reviews.text: The Pro Dental Mouth Guard was too big for my mouth even after trimming it. BUT, this Company stands by their product and could not have been more helpful. They offered to thin my mouthguard for me and returned it very quickly. It was then a perfect fit. A wonderful company that stands by their products. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this company and the mouth guard.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Feels and fits just like the expensive one my dentist made me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my $500 night guard that I chewed through. I took the time to read instructions, trimmed the height of the trays and carefully molded each mouthpiece. result is these feel exactly the same as the mouthpiece my dentist made me if not more comfortable because they are slightly softer and chewier. I speculate I will chew to these rather fast but I don't care because they are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Valle

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this product and couldn't get a perfect fit. Even after following the very detailed instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and couldn't get a perfect fit. Even after following the very detailed instructions the mouth guard felt too big in my mouth. I emailed the company and they promptly responded! They sent me 2 of their newest mouth guards free of cost! I received the newest mouth guards very quickly (I was surprised since they didn't even charge me shipping) and they worked great. I'm super impressed with not only the mouth guards but the company as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, thick, a little thinner than what my dentist sold to me, but it is way comfortable to use. I also bought their Thin version. Dentist charged me $300. So glad the dentist finally recommended me to find store bought mouth guard. Glad I found Pro Dental. They provided the best customer service. Recommended this to my sisters too.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful, easy to make.
customer_reviews.text: I find this night guard very helpful and comfortable so far. I'm impressed with the reports on their customer service, though I have not had to use it. I have to admit I made a mess of my first try at molding the night guard: I forgot to center it using the notch that is in the guard. My fault. A word on the video, though: the doctor's explanation of molding the night guard is fine, but there basically is no camerawork, so you can't actually SEE what he describes.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: They have such great customer service - when the traditional size didn't fit my super small mouth, they sent me a different type that is thinner right away and they work so much better! The mouth guards themselves are very easy to use and mold. The thicker ones were harder for me to trim down but most people probably wouldn't need to but the thinner ones were great. Rare to see this kind of customer service these days!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: 5 Years
customer_reviews.text: I have used mine every night for 5 years. The original sale had two in the box. I still have #2 in the box. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought these for the occasional rugby match but also use them with heavy deadlifts since I have a tendency to clench my teeth. Inside of the package are 3 different sized mouth guards with plenty of instructions to insure the best results possible. I found that the 2 larger guards fit and I decided to mold them both in the off chance I lose one of them. Followed the instructions to a T and I'm very pleased with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dwarfsmasher

customer_reviews.title: But the customer service is great. As soon as I contacted them via email
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to prevent night grinding. The original mouth guards are too thick. But the customer service is great. As soon as I contacted them via email, they immediately sent two smaller and thinner mouth guards which fit well. I have been using them for a week now and they did their job.
customer_reviews.author: Qianyi Zhou

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel comfortable without it
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. I ordered these because my insurance didn't cover the mouth guard my dentist wanted to make for me. Besides wearing out my teeth, my nightly clenching and grinding was leading to severe aches in my neck and upper back. Those days are gone, and it's only been a few weeks. It took me about two nights to get used to sleeping with a mouth guard, but now that I am used to it, I don't feel comfortable without it. Highly recommended as an alternative to prescription guards.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This mouth guard works very well for the money. I've worn a custom made night guard from my dentist for nearly 20 yrs so I know how they're supposed to fit. After years of faithful service, my custom night guard got chipped & I didn't feel like spending $450 + for another one so I decided to try this one from ProDental. While it's not nearly as form fitting & durable as my old one, the $30 price for 3 is definitely good value & does the job of protecting my teeth from grinding. How well it works long term remains to be seen, but so far I am very satisfied with this product after using it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: creekdweller

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! For us
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! For us, the thinner version did the trick. We had a question, and we heard back almost immediately. Our sense is that the seller sees this as a mission, and he is doing all he can to assure folks who need his product get all its benefits. The support is exemplary!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a dentist told me a grim tale of how grinding is ruining my teeth and gums. Great. Just great. Then he wanted to charge $400 for a mouth guard. No thanks dentist. But big thanks to ProDental for providing this at a fraction of that cost. Not excited about wearing a mouth guard while I sleep but I'm getting used to it. Hope it helps. Product is easy to use, just follow the directions provided.
customer_reviews.author: AndreW

customer_reviews.title: high quality Mouth guard at fraction of the cost compared to Dentist's
customer_reviews.text: fits me nice and comfortable for sleep. works great. the only challenge is molding/preparing the plastic to fit my mouth. i "burned up" four pieces of plastic to get to a perfect fit. manufacturer sent additional plastic at no cost to me after i informed them of my problem. excellent and reliable customer service. would have given 5 stars if not for the delicate process required to fit the mouth guard. the process involves a little more trial and error and can easily use up the 3 plastics provided. super good bargain at $25, excellent mouth guard at fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I had better luck forming the second dental guard and the fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hypersensitive gag reflex and have been looking forward to using this night guard. I ran into a little trouble forming the first guard which stuck to the side of the pan of hot water. It collapsed and is unuseable. I had better luck forming the second dental guard and the fit seems perfect. I have been offered a replacement set of dental guards and expect no problems with the forming process. I am very satisfied with my experience with the ProDental guards. This company has excellant customer service and seems truly concerned about the quality of the product and customer comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Anchovy  Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the dentist prescribed 1/30th the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wasted one trying to fit it to my mouth but got it right on the second night guard. I've been wearing it for a few weeks now and it is comfortable and a fraction of the cost my dentist would have charged. I am very happy with this purchase and would purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: These were too thick for my comfort, so Pro-dental sent me 2 ultra-comfort models for free
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for customer service. I found that these were too thick for my comfort, but in the package was an offer from Pro-Dental for 2 of their Ultra-comfort model dental guards. Within 3 days of my contacting the company I had the thinner guards in my hand. (and they work wonderfully).
customer_reviews.author: Alan S

customer_reviews.title: Seller shipped rapidly and the item was well packaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: Seller shipped rapidly and the item was well packaged. The instructions are clear, though I did ruin the first guard by leaving it in the hot water too long. The company also sent an email set of instructions and contact information immediately after purchase. Very impressed. The guard has helped with teeth grinding and I got used to it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HNR

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied with ease of making, custom fit and working with high quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Received product intact, easy to read and understand instructions (also viewed video they recommended to watch which helped immensely), first try successful. Extremely happy with results. Using as mouth guard. Would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: mtnbkr

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The mouth guard works well for my clenching. I'm thankful my particular batch was sent with three smaller guards (the ProDental Ultra ComfortTM Dental Guards, I think) as a bonus since I have a small mouth and that's the size I've been using. So, if you have a smaller mouth, make sure you order the smaller size. I clean them with denture cleaner tablets and they stay clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J

customer_reviews.title: High quality and good value
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, excellent instructions (includes a video), thick guards can last a year or more, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pheeps

customer_reviews.title: too bulky, not comfortable, very hard to shape
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad this is working for everyone else but i don't see how this can be used as a nighttime dental guard..i only see it as an athletic guard. even watching videos and reading instructions, the molding process is very difficult (or maybe i just have very large teeth?)
customer_reviews.author: Fong L.

customer_reviews.title: Mouth Guards from ProDental
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting a good mold due to misalignment of an eye tooth. The customer services is as good as advertised. A quick call and explanation of my problem and they were helpful in telling how to correct it, and the next mold was perfect. I have a small mouth and while the thickness of the guard did not matter In that it's comfortable, but I did trim about 3/8" off the back on both sides. ProDental mailed me replacements for the one's I tried to mold before I called. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Toes

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a do it yourself mouth guard to help prevent tooth to tooth grinding. It does not have the stability of a custom made night guard, nor the price tag of $750. I believe it helps , although if your bruxism is severe, don't expect these guard to last long, they will need to be replaced often.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sheriff

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing lock jaw
customer_reviews.text: I have TMJ and for years I’ve been wearing dentist created mouth guards. But since they cost a small fortune and I regularly forget them on my pillow where my dogs eat them, I figured it was worth a shot to try something more cost effective. For other TMJ sufferers, I only clench my jaw, not grind it, so I’d check with a trusted dentist/dr before moving to an over the counter product if you grind your teeth. That said, this product is awesome for me!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Troup

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered these, I wasn't very impressed. The guards were huge and bulky and I couldn't even close my mouth all the way. However, after speaking to customer service, they sent me 2 thinner ones at no cost and they totally worked. Their customer service is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: brenda rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mouth guard for night grinding. I had tried several other mouth guards and didn’t realize how ineffective they were until I tried a ProDental Ultra Comfort Dental Guard. It was simple to fit and form. The first night I wore it was the best night of sleep I’ve had in months. I absolutely love this guard and would highly recommend it. I will absolutely buy more so I always have one available.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product and company. There were complete instructions included in the package, plus a link to an instructional video explaining how to fit the dental guard. I also got a follow-up email from the seller with additional instructions. Very good customer service overall, and the product seems solid as well. I've just started using it, so I don't know how long one guard lasts, but it definitely has much better fit and retention than other guards I've used, including the more expensive Dentek brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Fratelli

customer_reviews.title: The guard works and cleans easily. The important thing to me is that there ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a while, 2 guards, and an email to get this right, but when I did it works well. I had a question that was not answered by the directions or video, and when I emailed for further information, the reply was quick, helpful, and fully answered my question. The guard works and cleans easily. The important thing to me is that there is more coverage on the front teeth than the other guards I tried - which may be a useful piece of info for people with missing back teeth. I recommend this product, but wish it had more complete instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Try this first!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I'm a grinder. Last night after following the fitting instructions I put this in. At first I was afraid that I wouldn't be able to get to sleep with this in my mouth, but no problem. Woke up in the morning with no face ache. Yeay! It does what it says it does! A dentist quoted me 1200 for a guard. Another wanted to inject 60 units of botox in my jaws and put me on muscle relaxants. Sometimes the simplest solution is the best. Now if this company can come out with a DIY veneer kit...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and affordable too!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! and affordable too! kind of tricky to mold them but once you get it done you will rest at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are not enough words to express what a wonderful experience I have had with this mouth guard
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough words to express what a wonderful experience I have had with this mouth guard. After watching Dr. Colin on the video I still (in my clutzy manner) managed to mess up all three guards. I called the provided 800 number and the phone was answered by Dr. Colin. Without hesitation he sent me 3 new guards. I have been able to successfully make an impression of my teeth and it is a perfect fit and controls my night time grinding. Do yourself a favor and purchase this product. The price is right! And the customer service is like you seldom experience in this day and age. Incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Glory E. Wiltjer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on 3 mouth guards
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on 3 mouth guards. Dentist quoted me $500 on a custom molded mouth guard to protect my teeth from grinding while I sleep, insurance denied the claim, so instead of dishing out WAY too much cash, I bought these at about $29. After about 2 weeks, these mouth guards have proven themselves effective. I have not been waking up with headaches from my teeth grinding, and the mouth guards were very easy to mold (just followed the included instructions). Not sure at this point how long each guard will last, but I'm sure these will end up being much more cost effective down the road versus dentist's guards. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: arcanum

customer_reviews.title: follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Followed direction and watched video, no problems at all. Fits well and has helped tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: J. Early

customer_reviews.title: Better than the dentist!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to form to mouth, great protection! I use it for night grinding that was very painful. This guard is thicker than the ones from the dentist, which is what I needed. (Not to mention a fraction of the cost!) No more pain. Came with great instructions and the seller sent an email at time of purchase with great tips, which I really appreciated. I am very happy with my purchase. This review is for the 3-in-1 Mouth Guard from ProDental, sold by ProDental.
customer_reviews.author: karalizs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the most configurable and thin device I've found yet. This would be far better than stock trays provided for whitening. Used for bruxing at night, and they are virtually unobtrusive. You MUST follow the directions exactly, but they are well written, and the result is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: historyfuzz

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty good the only thing is they are very thick ...
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty good the only thing is they are very thick so it's not the most comfortable. If you're using this as a mouth guard then I'm sure it's great! I was using it for teeth whitening and I think because the plastic is so thick that it didn't mold 100% to my teeth, I followed the directions and let the plastic curl quite a bit and immediately put it in my mouth but it hardened pretty quickly. It's much better than the super cheap ones out there that don't work at all but also not the very best either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to get your mouth guard.
customer_reviews.text: Very economical and easy to use. Beats having to pay hundreds of dollars for a customized guard at the dentist. Great that it came with multiple guards and extra free ones so you can do multiple redo if you ever messed up on first try.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Ha

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company has excellent customer service . Very helpful instructions and emailing additional instructions and a video to watch. I actually followed the instructions and am very pleased with the fit and the product. I never needed to cut anything. Just make sure Do not bite down when you get your fit for the upper teeth.I'd highly recommend going with this brand, plus you get 3 guards. I was able to get excellent fit from the first attempt .
customer_reviews.author: Dima Youssef

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that the customer service was fantastic. I ordered these because I have a small ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the customer service was fantastic. I ordered these because I have a small mouth and have trouble with mouth guards being to bulky. It said that you could send these in for free to get them thinned out, so when I emailed them to ask how to go about sending them in to get thinned out they just sent out 2 of their thinner mouth guards for free. And these worked perfectly for me. Great product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mchev

customer_reviews.title: great mouth guard
customer_reviews.text: i've used a lot of mouth guards due to me grinding my teeth at night. i have found these to be the best in my opinion so far in terms of comfort and price. i guess i have a normal sized mouth and sometimes i will cut a bit off of the end to fit my jaw/teeth positioning.
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Works great without costing a fortune!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband after looking at recommendations. It’s his first guard, so I didn’t want to spend $150 for something he might decide he didn’t want to use. This works great! He was able to do the molding very easily and wakes up without headaches in the morning. I don’t know that I’ll ever want to buy any other guard.
customer_reviews.author: Timarie Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Positive results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my guard approximately 2 weeks ago. I bought this as I tend to grind my teeth some. I fitted according to directions and obtained a satisfactory fit. Having a few questions about the final fit and usage, I contacted the company and was truly surprised at the level of help I received from them. They are a positive exception when it comes to customer service. I would recommend them but make sure you follow the fitting instructions for a proper fit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard W. Leger

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Fits Great, and Offered an Extremely Affordable Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with biting down very hard when I work out. My dentist was not pleased with this, but I wasn't pleased with his suggestion to buy a $300 custom fitted mouth pieced.... Needless to say, I went with this, followed the very complete directions, and have enjoyed it since. It works amazingly well, and is a fraction of the cost that you'd pay at a dentist. Please try this before you buy an expensive "custom fitted" mouth piece from your dentist. I promise you'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Billy C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mouthguard
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price and the quality! Above all- the customer service is incredible and they try their best to help you as much as possible! If you can't/don't want to spend the hundreds of dollars it costs to get a one professionally made - look no further!! This is arguably the most comparable and such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Zeel S.

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than ideal but better than grinding my teeth away.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy these as a temp until you can afford a real one then it is 100% worth the money. Compare them for what they are and you will be satisfied. Stopped my teeth from getting messed up, lasts easily past the date they recommend for use. They are thicker than desired but i got used to them and it doesn't present a problem. Would not recommend for use longer than a year. spend the Money and get a real custom mouth guard. Better fit and last longer overall.
customer_reviews.author: Parker A

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I found the mouthguard to be slightly too thick at 3mm. I sent an email to the vendor at 8pm PST and I heard back within 2 hours that night. The dentist sent me new thinner mouthguards that arrived 4 days later with instructions to thin them out if they were too thick. Really amazing experience. Even if you are not satisfied with the initial product they will make it work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Potter

customer_reviews.title: Best mouth guard for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great mouth guard! I bought these because of a bruxism problem and it work just fine. Once trimmed down slightly, it fits well and doesn’t move around as I sleep. This is the second one I have bought because my dog chewed up the first ones. I have bought other brands and have found this one to be the best. Would buy again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how great these are. Dentist and ENT doctor told me I've been grinding my teeth at night and also have TMJ. These weren't too thick like the other sports one I tried first. They molded perfectly and didn't even have to adjust to wearing them at night to sleep. Ever since I started wearing them, I haven't woken up with headaches and a sore jaw. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SheriZ74

customer_reviews.title: Chronic Grinder Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I grind my teeth constantly and it is a real pain. Not only does it cause enamel wear but recently it has started giving me headaches, all the time headaches. So I decided on a mouth guard. It is great. They sent 3 separate ones!!!. Once you put it in hot water it moulds accordingly and fits nice and snug over the teeth. It might feel a bit odd at first having something in your mouth while you sleep, it takes getting used to, but it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C.T

customer_reviews.title: ... over-the-counter night guard myself as a dentist so I better know what I'm recommending to my patients
customer_reviews.text: Decided to test an over-the-counter night guard myself as a dentist so I better know what I'm recommending to my patients. Pleasantly surprised at how well it fits for not having any fancy equipment. I trimmed the flanges a little with a sharp pair of scissors and then used a lighter to heat up the corners and round them off, made it a quite a bit more comfortable. Just read the instructions a couple times before you mold it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Moulding the guards are super simple, just read the instructions. They're clear, precise and the company even EMAILS you the instructions and information you may need to contact them with any other inquiries. They even offer to trim them down if its still too thick for you, FOR FREE. I have a bad habit of clenching my teeth at night. These guards have made it much nicer to wake up, pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow the directions and watched video indicated in the instructions. I'm 5'9" with an average size mouth, no cutting of the Mouth Guard needed. First time sleeping with a Mouth Guard because of grinding of teeth. Concerned with choking during sleep, it stayed in place, fit is snug, I had no problem sleeping with it in. Seller and Product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nodivots

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use and needs some time to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: It works with me very well for teeth grinding. It’s easy to use and needs some time to get used to it. The first molding is very important, very little can be changed after the second molding.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for night guard
customer_reviews.text: I mold the first one and after a couple of hours of wearing it hurt my gum due to the side rises too high. So on the second attempt I trim the side to make it shorter and that was better but after a couple of nights it still hurting my gum. Will return this.
customer_reviews.author: Normal consumer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value
customer_reviews.text: We have tried four of the different mouth guard products on the market and this is the best of them, and the best value with three of them in the box. Comfortable for my 11 year old, and easy to mold.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Silverman

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best off the shelf night guard I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best off the shelf night guard I have used. They come with very complete and thoughtful instructions and are relatively easy to fit. Once fitted, they stay in place and do their job. Plus, at under $20 for a three pack, they are a bargain. If these don't work for you, you probably need to have one made by a dentist as they are the best night guards currently on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better than what you can get in a box store
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good bike guard it took me about four times honestly to get it molded right I feel like if they had a tray that came with it for you to do your biting it might see better. I had to trim mine but for the price it was a good value and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: amanda peterson

customer_reviews.title: LIFE IS A GRIND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ruined the first one but did fine the second time....when the company asked my opinion and I told them this, they sent another, free of charge...pretty good, eh??? I paid 500. for a guard from my dentist and lost it somehow....I was puzzled that a second would cost the same considering they already had my impression from the first...this product does the trick for a fraction of the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Otway

product_meta.title: Professional Mouth Guard for Grinding Teeth - 6 Customizable Dental Guards - 2 Sizes, USA Made, BPA Free | Eliminate Bruxism, Teeth Clenching | Also for Sports & Teeth Whitening
product_meta.description:
BEST VALUE-6 Mouth Guards with Free Replacement. USA Made, BPA Free & Latex Free Finest Quality Polyvinyl Material

When you purchase the ProDental 3-in-1 Mouth Guard set you will receive 6 high quality mouth guards that can be used for either Nighttime Teeth Grinding Protection, 
as an Athletic Mouth Guard or as a Teeth Whitening Tray

What separates the ProDental 3-in-1 Mouth Guard from the competition? It starts with… 

 - PERFECT FIT - easily trimmed to fit any mouth size. However, if you have a small mouth or used to wearing a thinner dentist made mouth guard then the ProDental Thin and Trim Anti Grinding, Teeth Whitening Mouth Guard 
may be a better option for you (search for: B01MECB4I3 on Amazon) 
- DENTIST DESIGN & SUPPORT- The only mouth guard on the market that has direct dentist support to help with the molding or fitting process. A dentist is on staff providing email, phone & free lab support 
- CUSTOM MOLDED – you can custom mold your mouth guard to ensure a precise fit – this is not a one size fits all mouth guard! Plus get a Free Replacement if you mismold 
- BUILT TO LAST - thick 3mm durable base provides extra cushion and shock absorption and also prevents wear through 
- EASILY ADAPTED - Fits a variety of teeth alignments, tooth size & mouth shape for optimal retention - secure fit locks in place while sleeping. Can be worn on either upper or lower teeth 


It’s because of this that we’re able to make a guarantee unlike any other you’ve seen for a mouth guard. We call it our Better Than Money Back Guarantee and here it is… 

Try our ProDental 3-in-1 Mouth Guards for 30 days. If you don’t love the way they fit or work for you, we’ll give you your full payment back no questions asked, whether you use 1 or all 3 guards in the set (only applies to purchases made from MKC Products) 

Click the Orange Button at the Top of this Page to Protect Your Smile Now!
feature_bullets: DENTIST PROFESSIONAL DESIGN & SUPPORT - The only moldable guards on the market that have direct dentist support. If you need help with the molding or fitting process a dentist is on staff providing email, phone and free dental lab support.
CUSTOMIZABLE FIT FOR PROTECTION AGAINST TEETH GRINDING & BRUXISM - Set of 6 mouth guards can be trimmed and customized to fit for any size mouth (age 12+) for optimal comfort and retention.

BUILT TO LAST – Mouth guards are made in the USA from high quality long-lasting, hygienic, soft, odor free and taste free polyvinyl material … each dental guard lasts 12 months or longer when used as a night guard, or as an athletic protector or as teeth whitening trays
OPTIMAL RETENTION – Each of the 6 multi-use mouth guards are moldable to ensure a precise fit for guaranteed retention and comfort

MAXIMUM VERSATILITY – Multi-use functionality and durable design of each occlusal guard gives you the most cost effective solution. Order now with peace of mind due to our free replacement, 30 day “better than money-back” guarantee. See product description below for more info.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
